title: The Dream - The argument of the second stanza

content.question: The argument of the second stanza (lines 9-16) is that ultimately

choices.label: fantasy governs the waking loverâ€™s mind
love brings the purest form of joy
sense precludes the joys supplied by fantasy
the joy of love makes one forget the pain

content.answer: sense precludes the joys supplied by fantasy

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
